articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Myanmar Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Myanmar Foreign Ministry Delegation 
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar led by Deputy Minister Thant Kyaw who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Ki Nam Meets Co-Chairman of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Council
articles.content:
Kim Ki Nam Meets Co-Chairman of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Council 
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Indian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Indian Ambassador 
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong had a talk with Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Ajay Kumar Sharma who paid a farewell call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Deputy Foreign Minister of Myanmar
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Deputy Foreign Minister of Myanmar
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the visiting deputy foreign minister of Myanmar.
					 The gift was conveyed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, by Deputy Minister Thant Kyaw who is heading a delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar on Thursday.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Denounces U.S. for Disturbing Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Denounces U.S. for Disturbing Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations 
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Thursday gave an answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that the U.S. is working hard to disturb the atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations created by the north-south high-level urgent contact.
					 These days there have been a series of positive achievements in the efforts to implement the joint press release after the urgent contact including a Red Cross working-level contact between the north and the south, preparations for reunion of separated families and relatives making progress according to its schedule, the spokesman said, and went on: 
					
					 However, the U.S. is interfering in the work while openly hindering it.
					
					 The White House, those concerned of the U.S. State Department and Defense Department and experts on Korean issue vied with each other to assert that "it is not the first time that north Korea broke the promise", "it is necessary to wait and see". They claimed Obama and Park Geun Hye in their talks slated for October would deal with the issues of denuclearization of the north and human rights with weighty importance. They are making desperate efforts to hold a "seminar on human rights in north Korea" on an unprecedented scale  in the U.S. in a bid to build up public opinion critical of the DPRK and drive a wedge between the north and the south. 
					
					 They are egging the south Korean authorities onto resuming the psychological anti-north broadcasting, asserting that it is the "best solution" to changing the north's attitude. They are spreading the "story of north's provocation in October" and mulling hurling the special warfare forces under the 10th Mountaineering Division of the U.S. Army from the U.S. mainland into south Korea in an effort to escalate the military tension on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 This clearly proves the hypocritical nature of the U.S. and that it is a cancer-like entity disturbing peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Nothing is possible for improving the north-south relations if the U.S. is allowed to continue interfering and disturbing the north-south relations.
					
					 Here is the reason why the DPRK is consistently upholding the slogan "By Our Nation Itself" for improving the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 We will never allow the moves of the U.S. and its followers to scuttle the hard-won phase of detente and disturb the improvement of the north-south relations.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday. They included Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, and a delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar led by Deputy Minister Thant Kyaw.
					 The guests paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state the guests made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Myanmar Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Myanmar Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar led by Deputy Minister Thant Kyaw visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President, members of the delegation looked round historic relics preserved with much care.
					
					 They also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District and the Pyongyang Folklore Park.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un 
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket by Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, on a visit to the DPRK. 
					 Johnny Hon conveyed the floral basket to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, on Thursday.

articles.title: 9th National Hypothetical and Idea Presentation Held
articles.content:
9th National Hypothetical and Idea Presentation Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- The 9th national hypothetical and idea presentation took place in Hamhung and Phyongsong cities respectively from September 14 to 17 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 The presentation was held, divided into eastern and western coastal areas.
					
					 Present there were scientists, technicians and teachers of science and education institutions including units under the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology and Kim Hyong Jik University of Education.
					
					 Presented were more than 330 papers of hypothesis and ideas conducive to developing the country's economy and science and technology and improving the people's living standard.

articles.title: Child with Distinguished Handicraft
articles.content:
Child with Distinguished Handicraft
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Ri Ryo Myong, a first-year pupil of Jonsung Primary School in Moranbong District, Pyongyang, is known for his handiwork. He can make animals, flowers and any other object out of paper.
					 Ri has loved to play with paper from his kindergarten days. Excellent at observation, thought and memory, he wanted to represent anything with paper. His talents developed under the deep care of kindergarten teachers, who taught him how to have a vivid idea of object and represent its features, guiding him to the Central Zoo and other places.
					
					 After all, he produced a collection of paper handiworks picturing the nursery tales told by the peerlessly great persons and his happy kindergarten days and dreams of hope.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un personally viewed the collection and a letter the child presented.

articles.title: April 25 Sports Team Wins Torch Cup
articles.content:
April 25 Sports Team Wins Torch Cup
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- 30-odd day-long men's premier soccer league matches for Torch Cup, which started in July here, came to a close, registering an average of 3.2 goals per game through 50 matches.
					 The April 25 Sports Team topped the team standings with three wins and three draws. The team beat the Wolmido team 2:0 in the semi-finals and overwhelmed the Kigwancha team 5:1, thus winning the first place in the tournament for three consecutive years.

articles.title: Environmental Protection in Power Station Area of DPRK
articles.content:
Environmental Protection in Power Station Area of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- The Global Environment Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK has taken thorough measures to protect the environment in the area of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station under construction.
					 According to Dr. Kang Kon Ho, a researcher of the faculty, its research group settled sci-tech issues in grasping hydrologic character, actual conditions of water resources and water and ecological environment in the area.
					
					 The group developed practicable software, a combination of geographical information system (GIS), remoter sensing (RS) and the latest mathematical model technique, which helps estimate the change of water quality, landslip risks and groundwater level change and remove or minimize unfavorable conditions.
					
					 It also worked out an environment monitoring plan to provide a scientific foundation for protecting the environment in the area.

articles.title: Meeting of Proud Children Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Proud Children Held 
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of proud children at the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace on Thursday on the occasions of the 25th anniversary of the DPRK's accession to the UN convention on the rights of the children and the 30th anniversary of the DPRK's cooperation with the United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF).
					 Present at the meeting were officials of ministries, national institutions and media institutions, teachers and students of schools in Pyongyang including Kumsong Secondary School No. 1 and Changjon Primary School in Central District and members of missions of the international organizations here including the representative of the UNICEF.
					
					 At the event speakers said that the DPRK has put forward children as the king of the country and consistently carried out the policy of attaching importance to the future and children since its founding.
					
					 An art performance was given by schoolchildren.
					
					 The participants went round writings, drawings and embroideries on the theme of "My hope, my pride" showing the skills of Korean children and visited various rooms for hobby groups of the palace.

articles.title: Sci-tech Presentations in Fields of Machine Industry, Veterinary and Animal Husbandry Held
articles.content:
Sci-tech Presentations in Fields of Machine Industry, Veterinary and Animal Husbandry Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- National scientific and technological presentations in the fields of machine industry and veterinary and animal husbandry took place in Hamhung and Sariwon cities on September 16 and 17 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were officials, scientists, technicians, teachers and three-revolution team members of units under the State Academy of Sciences, of Kye Ung Sang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 Submitted to the presentations were valuable papers worked out to solve the scientific and technological problems for the production of custom-built equipment necessary for national economy, the modernization of the Ryongsong Machine Complex and the production of livestock.
					
					 A lecture was delivered and a video was shown. They dealt with the scientific and technological issues arising in the production system design of the foundry in the environment of the computer integrated manufacturing and the increase of livestock production at present.

articles.title: 12th National Ssirum Tournament for Grand Bull Prize Held
articles.content:
12th National Ssirum Tournament for Grand Bull Prize Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- The 12th National Ssirum (Korean wrestling) Tournament for Grand Bull Prize was held at the wrestling site on Rungna Islet from Sept. 15 to 17.
					 The tournament brought together more than 100 players from Pyongyang and Nampho cities and each province. Divided into body-weight and catch-weight events they competed in knockout matches.
					
					 Nam Hyon Il from North Hamgyong Province came first in 55 kg category body-weight event, Pak Chol Ryong from South Hwanghae Province in 60 kg category event, Kim Tae Il from Kangwon Province in 65 kg category event, Ri Chol Yong from Pyongyang City in 70 kg category event, Jang Hyon U from Pyongyang City in 75 kg category event and Kim Song Jun from Pyongyang City in 80 kg category event and Pak Kwang Chol from Pyongyang City in above 80kg category event. 
					
					 Pyongyang City placed first in team standing.
					
					 Jo Myong Jin from North Phyongan Province came first in the catch-weight event.
					
					 At the closing ceremony a grand bull weighing 1 100kg, a gold bull bell and diploma were awarded to Jo Myong Jin.

articles.title: 42nd National Farm Machine Exhibition, Contrivers' Meeting Held
articles.content:
42nd National Farm Machine Exhibition, Contrivers' Meeting Held 
						
 Sukchon, September 17 (KCNA) -- The 42nd National Farm Machine Exhibition and contrivers' meeting took place in Sukchon County, South Phyongan Province from September 15 to 17.
					 Presented there were agricultural machine, accessories, farm implements, agricultural machine suited to water-saving style farming method and other new machine products conducive to increasing the agricultural production.
					
					 There were judgment and evaluation of more than 300 agricultural machines, equipment and accessories in four categories to be followed by field testing.
					
					 Drawing the interest of the participants were level-plowing plough and multifunctional combined crusher effective for applying new scientific farming method that suits the soil conditions of Korea.
					
					 The contrivers' meeting exchanged successes and experience gained in contriving and manufacturing farm machines and introducing them and discussed the issues of generalizing them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Going All Out in Spirit of At a Go
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Going All Out in Spirit of At a Go
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- At a go, this is a militant spirit of the powerful  revolutionary Paektusan army and an invincible spirit of Songun Korea which does not know the word impossible, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The spirit of At a Go is the strenuous offensive spirit of the service personnel who regard the implementation of the order given by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un as their lifeblood.
					
					 The service personnel's transparent spirit of implementing the leader's orders serves as the driving force for proving the validity of the party's policy, defending the authority of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and safeguarding the people's trust and confidence in the party.
					
					 The Korean People's Army does not know the word stopping half-way under any conditions and circumstances and never allow stagnation and standstill.
					
					 The grand blueprint of building a thriving nation unfolded by our party is the course of charge of the heroic KPA that will never change.
					
					 Let us take responsibility for the safety of the projects and guarantee their absolute quality for all eternity! This is transparent patriotism and the aim of fight of the service personnel.
					
					 We should record every moment of our life as a heroic struggle with the great efforts by learning from the example of the service personnel, personifiers of indomitable spirit and resolute offensive spirit.
					
					 All Koreans should create labor gifts of loyalty presented to the 70th anniversary of the founding of the WPK in the spirit of heroic struggle of the service personnel and the spirit of At a Go, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un, and proudly greet the grand festival of October.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korean Authorities to Take Proper Attitude
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korean Authorities to Take Proper Attitude
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Serious moves conflicting with the recent atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations are being seen in south Korea one after another. 
					 On Sept. 15, the U.S. and the south Korean military warmongers kicked off a frantic action of reenacting the Inchon landing operation dating back to the past June 25 war.
					
					 After staging the farce of "commemorating" the landing operation in the Command of Defending Waters off Inchon of the south Korean Navy from Sept. 12, they reenacted the operation in the waters off Wolmi Islet that day.
					
					 Warships, planes, landing armored cars with various missions of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean army and their huge offensive armed forces including special warfare forces and commandos were involved in the naval charge amid fire support from the sea and the air.
					
					 In the past war, the U.S. forces held the Inchon landing operation aimed to occupy the whole of the DPRK. The reenacting at a time when the fundamental turn of improving the inter-Korean relations was provided is no more than an act to disturb the situation that has entered the phase of stability.
					
					 The north-south high-level urgent contact was held and issues to defuse the military tension and develop the north-south relations were agreed. After that all the Koreans hope articles of the joint press release on them would be sincerely implemented in order to provide new circumstances for peaceful reunification.
					
					 At a time when the north and the south should positively promote the improved relations through dialogue and cooperation, acts against the compatriots have been openly committed in south Korea in collusion with outside forces. How can this be understood?
					
					 A few days after the joint press release, the south Korean military warmongers kicked off indiscriminate firing operation aimed at the DPRK with various kinds of artillery pieces, planes, tanks and other offensive weapons in Phochon, Kyonggi Province in collusion with the U.S. forces. And they waged bio-chemical warfare drill some days ago while talking about someone's "biological threat".
					
					 The south Korean authorities are even slandering the DPRK's strategic line while getting vociferous about the "north's nuclear threat" at home and abroad.
					
					 The south Korean authorities reached an important agreement, promising the improved inter-Korean relations, but, behind the scene they held war drills against the dialogue partner in collusion with outside forces, persisting in confrontation. This is a dangerous provocation hurting the hard-won atmosphere of stability. 
					
					 If they are sincerely interested in the improved inter-Korean relations, they should stop the hostile military acts against compatriots. 
					
					 They should value the hard-won atmosphere of reconciliation and stability and take a sincere stand on the improvement of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 All Koreans are following the south Korean authorities' attitude.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea Denounced by Romanian Body
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' Presence in S. Korea Denounced by Romanian Body
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- The Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website The Juche Idea an article titled "U.S. forces' presence in south Korea obstructive to peace and reunification on Korean Peninsula" on Sept. 10.
					 It is 70 years since the U.S. occupied south Korea, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. forces' presence in south Korea under the helmet of "UN Forces" is the very source of disturbing peace on the Korean Peninsula, the biggest hotspot in the world.
					
					 The U.S. is prodding the south Korean authorities into escalating confrontation between compatriots and igniting a new war in a bid to stifle the DPRK, that turned into a socialist power of Juche, at any cost.
					
					 It should pay heed to voices of the peace-loving forces of the world, give up its anachronistic moves to stifle the DPRK, immediately withdraw all the aggression forces deployed in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity and take hands off the peninsula.
					
					 It should neither underestimate the might of the Korean people possessing powerful nuclear deterrence nor forget the lesson it drew from the Korean War.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Iran
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the Hadian Publishing House of Iran on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995) is a great programme of the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the WPK that pioneered a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and indicates the way of strengthening the party into one of the President forever.

articles.title: German Body Supports Report of DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies
articles.content:
German Body Supports Report of DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany made public a statement on Sept. 10 in support of the report of the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK, a sovereign state, referred in detail to the frivolous anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. and the West based on their view on value.
					
					 When looking back on history, the U.S. is the most barbarous human rights abuser as it has perpetrated all sorts of crimes against humanity such as hunting of Indians, slave trade, apartheid, A-bomb dropping in Hiroshima and Nagasaki of Japan and the nuclear test in the Asia-Pacific since the very day of its birth.
					
					 These human rights abuses go on in different countries and regions including Palestine, Iraq, Libya, Syria and Ukraine.
					
					 It is only the U.S. which has the greatest number of prisons in the world and in which criminals are allowed to carry weapons unhindered and parents shoot their children to death.
					
					 No matter how desperately it may mislead the world public through "human rights" racket against other countries, it can never get rid of its responsibility.

articles.title: Korean People's Anti-Fascist Struggle Praised by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Korean People's Anti-Fascist Struggle Praised by Swiss Bodies
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Sept. 11 in praise of the Korean people who joined the international anti-fascist alliance and greatly contributed to ending the Second World War.
					 The statement said:
					
					 70 years have passed since the Asian people won a victory in the anti-Japanese struggle and Japan surrendered in the Second World War.
					
					 What should not be forgotten is that the DPRK was part of the major international anti-fascist alliance against Germany, Italy, Japan, etc.
					
					 The Korean People's Revolutionary Army founded by President Kim Il Sung played a great role in the struggle against the Japanese imperialists during WWII.
					
					 The KPRA, together with the Northeast Anti-Japanese Allied Army of China and the Soviet Army, formed the International Allied Forces in 1942 while keeping their originality.
					
					 This made the KPRA an important component of the anti-fascist allied forces against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Korea's liberation on August 15, 1945 was a victory of the world peace-loving people against Japan and fascism.
					
					 The KPRA played a decisive role in the International Allied Forces in prevailing over fascist Hitler and militarist Japan.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Posted by Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Posted by Austrian Organization 
						
 Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted on its internet homepage "8. The Triumphant Return" from "Chapter 24 Nationwide Resistance against the Japanese" of Vol. 8 (Continuing Edition) of Part 1 the Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Ki Nam se reune con Johnny Hon
articles.content:
Kim Ki Nam se reune con Johnny Hon 
						
ã€€Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, departio el dia 17 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con Johnny Hon, copresidente del Consejo de la Fundacion Internacional Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: CRPP condena intento de aprobar "ley de derechos humanos del Norte"
articles.content:
CRPP condena intento de aprobar "ley de derechos humanos del Norte"
						
Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 16 una declaracion de denuncia a los partidos en poder y de oposicion del Sur de Corea que tratan de aprobar en la "Asamblea Nacional" un "proyecto de ley de DDHH del Norte" hablando tanto de que los articulos de ley fueron consultados principalmente.
					El "Partido Saenuri" y otras fuerzas conservadoras dicen que "fue posibilitada la aprobacion de la 'ley de DDHH del Norte' sometida a la Asamblea Nacional durante mas de 10 anos", mientras los partidos opositores excusan sobre esta vil conspiracion hablando de que "DDHH es el valor universal de la humanidad" y mencionando "la proteccion y la promocion de DDHH de la poblacion nortena".
					
					La nota lo condena categoricamente calificandolo de siniestra provocacion politica y abierta y de declaracion de confrontacion de regimenes y prosigue:
					
					La locura de los tipejos surcoreanos por la aprobacion de la "ley de DDHH del Norte" en la "Asamblea Nacional" coincidiendo en tiempo con las maniobras freneticas anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus satelites en la ONU y otras escenas internacionales en el marco de "DDHH" son malignos crimenes antinacionales que dejan el destino de la nacion como juguete de las fuerzas exteriores.
					
					Es muy natural que el pueblo surcoreano niegue y rechace las maniobras de aprobacion de la "ley de DDHH del Norte" como estupidez que empuja a la catastrofe las relaciones intercoreanas a contrapelo de la corriente de dialogo y mejora de las relaciones que estan en pleno auge por el acuerdo Norte-Sur.
					
					Lo mas abominable es que la "Asamblea Nacional" surcoreana parlotea de las "conversaciones interparlamentarias Norte-Sur" mientras preconiza por la conflictiva "ley de DDHH del Norte".
					
					Es una farsa de los hipocritas para enganar la opinion publica el que digan de la "ejecucion del acuerdo", la "mejora de relaciones" y el "dialogo" negando y oponiendose totalmente a su contraparte.
					
					Los politicastros surcoreanos no deben lanzar tales disparates sino arreglar primero el interior de su pais, infierno de DDHH, al ver correctamente nuestra realidad en que florece la vida verdadera de la poblacion.
					
					Ya proclamamos que nos enfrentaremos rotundamente a las maniobras de aprobacion de la "ley de DDHH del Norte" y la campana de "DDHH", considerandolas como declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de no perdonar ni en lo  minimo a los que violen nuestra dignidad y soberania.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia tentativas de EE.UU. de obstaculizar mejora de relaciones intercoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia tentativas de EE.UU. de obstaculizar mejora de relaciones intercoreanas
						
Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea formulada en relacion con que Estados Unidos maniobra para obstaculizar la corriente de la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas preparada por el contacto urgente de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) respondio el dia 17 como sigue:
					Ultimamente se efectuo el contacto de trabajo de la cruz roja entre ambas partes coreanas, se impulsan segun el plan establecido los preparativos del encuentro de familiares y parientes separados y asi se logran algunos avances positivos en la ejecucion de la informacion conjunta aprobada en el contacto urgente.
					
					Sin embargo, Estados Unidos se inmiscuye indiscretamente en esta labor para obstaculizarla abiertamente.
					
					Los funcionarios interesados de la Casa Blanca, los Departamentos de Estado y Defensa y los especialistas en asuntos coreanos exponen que el "Norte de Corea no cumplio muchas veces las promesas" y es "necesario observar un poco mas la posicion del Norte". Y parlotean que "se abordara con una importancia el problema de abolicion de armas nucleares y la mejora de derechos humanos del Norte (de Corea) en las conversaciones entre Obama y Park Geun-hye a sostenerse en octubre proximo". Por otra parte, organizaron en su propio territorio el llamado "seminario de DDHH del Norte" de gran dimension sin precedente para crear las opiniones negativas  sobre la RPDC y meter cuna entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Ademas, diciendo que la radioemision psicologica es el "mejor metodo" para cambiar la actitud del Norte incitan a las autoridades surcoreanas a la reanudacion de dicha radiodifusion.
					
					  Por otra parte, difunden el rumor de "provocacion del Norte en octubre" y pretenden agravar la tension militar de la Peninsula Coreana introduciendo en el Sur de Corea hasta las fuerzas armadas de la guerra especial pertenecientes a la 10a division de montana de las fuerzas terrestres norteamericanas estacionadas en su propio territorio.
					
					  Esto vuelve a demostrar la naturaleza enganosa e hipocrita de EE.UU. y el hecho de que este imperio deviene el cancer de la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Mientras existan la intervencion y las maniobras obstructoras de EE.UU., no sera resuelto ningun problema en las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  He aqui la razon por la que la RPDC insiste invariablemente en el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" en los lazos intercoreanos.
					
					La RPDC no tolerara jamas las maniobras de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras para destruir la situacion de la distension preparada a duras penas y poner obstaculos a la mejora de las relaciones de ambas partes coreanas.

articles.title: Efectuadas presentaciones nacionales de ciencias y tecnicas
articles.content:
Efectuadas presentaciones nacionales de ciencias y tecnicas 
						
Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Bajo el auspicio del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea, tuvieron lugar los dias 16 y 17 en las ciudades de Hamhung y Sariwon, respectivamente, las presentaciones nacionales de ciencias y tecnicas de las ramas de industria de construccion de maquinaria y de veterinaria y ganaderia.
					Tomaron parte en ellas los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos, profesores y los integrantes de los grupos por las tres revoluciones de las unidades adscritas a la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, el Instituto Superior de Agricultura Kye Ung Sang adscrito a la Universidad Kim Il Sung y la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, etc.
					
					Se presentaron las disertaciones valiosas logradas en la solucion de los problemas cientifico-tecnicos para producir las instalaciones pedidas de varias ramas de la economia nacional, modernizar el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong e incrementar la produccion de los productos pecuarios.
					
					Ademas, hubo la leccion y la proyeccion de multimedia sobre los problemas cientifico-tecnicos que se presentan en la actualidad para aumentar la produccion pecuaria y otros.

articles.title: Efectuada la IX presentacion nacional de hipotesis e inventos
articles.content:
Efectuada la IX presentacion nacional de hipotesis e inventos
						
Pyongyang, 17 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Bajo auspicio del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencias y Tecnicas de Corea, tuvo lugar del dia 14 al 17 en las ciudades de Hamhung y Phyongsong, respectivamente, la IX presentacion de hipotesis e inventos. 
					En el certamen realizado por separado en las zonas oriental y occidental, participaron los cientificos, tecnicos y profesores de los organos de ciencia y educacion, las fabricas, las empresas y las granjas inclusive las unidades adscritas a la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek y la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Hyong Jik.
					
					Se presentaron mas de 330 suposiciones e inventos que pueden contribuir a la solucion del problema de energia y a la sustitucion con las materias primas, materiales y equipos nacionales, asi que pueden aportar a desarrollar la economia y las ciencias y tecnicas del pais y mejorar la vida del pueblo.
